description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nVilestalker:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1968]Acid Rain. After this creature {ACTION_casts} this spell, it gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} and 20% {STAT_speed}.
name: Venomous Pelt
